title: clicking play and nothing happens
body: when i press launch nothings happens can someone help me

replies.body: This can sometimes happen when your OS doesn't recognize the program you're trying to launch, so your OS shuts it down in case it's a virus or something. It should be simple enough to get around by checking up on your [**permissions settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) but let me know if that doesn't do the trick!
